author: Daniel Greene
description:
The Wheel of Time hides one of its most powerful, heartbreaking histories in the sands of the Aiel Waste—unlocked only in Rhuidean. In this video, we explore the truth behind the Aiel: their origins, their oath to the Way of the Leaf, their transformation into fierce warriors, and the shocking revelations waiting in the glass columns of Rhuidean.

Whether you're a longtime fan or just diving into the lore, this is the full breakdown of one of the most important cultural arcs in the Wheel of Time universe.
